name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Customer-centric Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience driving high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **SQL**, **API** integration, and deploying **SaaS** solutions to enhance **CRM** and **ERP** systems. Equipped with exceptional **communication**, **teamwork**, and **adaptability** skills that foster strong customer engagement and satisfaction. Technical expertise includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside robust hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Demonstrated ability in building AI/ML-powered platforms supporting predictive analytics and real-time processing. Adept at deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside implementation of microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Highly knowledgeable in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps with expertise in model training, serving, and orchestration utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
